description: Git for data scientists - manage your code and data together.

dependencies.name: py-appdirs
dependencies.description:
A small Python module for determining appropriate platform-specific
dirs, e.g. a "user data dir".

dependencies.name: py-boto3
dependencies.description: The AWS SDK for Python.

dependencies.name: py-colorama
dependencies.description: Cross-platform colored terminal text.

dependencies.name: py-configobj
dependencies.description: Config file reading, writing and validation.

dependencies.name: py-dictdiffer
dependencies.description:
Dictdiffer is a helper module that helps you to diff and patch
dictionares.

dependencies.name: py-diskcache
dependencies.description: Disk Cache -- Disk and file backed persistent cache.

dependencies.name: py-distro
dependencies.description: Distro - an OS platform information API.

dependencies.name: py-dpath
dependencies.description: Filesystem-like pathing and searching for dictionaries.

dependencies.name: py-dulwich
dependencies.description:
Dulwich aims to provide an interface to Git repos (both local and
remote) that doesn't call out to Git directory, but instead uses pure
Python.

dependencies.name: py-flatten-dict
dependencies.description:
A flexible utility for flattening and unflattening dict-lik objects in
Python

dependencies.name: py-flufl-lock
dependencies.description: NFS-safe file locking with timeouts for POSIX and Windows

dependencies.name: py-fsspec
dependencies.description: A specification for pythonic filesystems.

dependencies.name: py-funcy
dependencies.description: A collection of fancy functional tools focused on practicality

dependencies.name: py-gitpython
dependencies.description: GitPython is a python library used to interact with Git repositories.

dependencies.name: py-grandalf
dependencies.description:
Grandalf is a Python package made for experimentations with graph
drawing algorithms.

dependencies.name: py-jsonpath-ng
dependencies.description:
A final implementation of JSONPath for Python that aims to be standard
compliant, including arithmetic and binary comparison operators.

dependencies.name: py-nanotime
dependencies.description:
The nanotime module provides a time object that keeps time as the number
of nanoseconds since the UNIX epoch. In other words, it is a 64bit UNIX
timestamp with nanosecond precision.

dependencies.name: py-networkx
dependencies.description:
NetworkX is a Python package for the creation, manipulation, and study
of the structure, dynamics, and functions of complex networks.

dependencies.name: py-packaging
dependencies.description: Core utilities for Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-paramiko
dependencies.description: SSH2 protocol library

dependencies.name: py-pathspec
dependencies.description:
pathspec extends the test loading and running features of unittest,
making it easier to write, find and run tests.

dependencies.name: py-pip
dependencies.description: The PyPA recommended tool for installing Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-ply
dependencies.description: Python Lex & Yacc.

dependencies.name: py-psutil
dependencies.description:
psutil is a cross-platform library for retrieving information on running
processes and system utilization (CPU, memory, disks, network) in
Python.

dependencies.name: py-pyasn1
dependencies.description:
Pure-Python implementation of ASN.1 types and DER/BER/CER codecs
(X.208).

dependencies.name: py-pydot
dependencies.description: Python interface to Graphviz's Dot language

dependencies.name: py-pygit2
dependencies.description:
Pygit2 is a set of Python bindings to the libgit2 shared library,
libgit2 implements the core of Git.

dependencies.name: py-pygtrie
dependencies.description: A pure Python implementation of a trie data structure.

dependencies.name: py-pyparsing
dependencies.description: A Python Parsing Module.

dependencies.name: py-python-benedict
dependencies.description:
A dict subclass with keylist/keypath support, I/O shortcuts and many
utilities.

dependencies.name: py-rich
dependencies.description:
Rich is a Python library for rich text and beautiful formatting in the
terminal.

dependencies.name: py-ruamel-yaml
dependencies.description:
a YAML parser/emitter that supports roundtrip preservation of comments,
seq/map flow style, and map key order

dependencies.name: py-setuptools
dependencies.description:
A Python utility that aids in the process of downloading, building,
upgrading, installing, and uninstalling Python packages.

dependencies.name: py-shortuuid
dependencies.description: A generator library for concise, unambiguous and URL-safe UUIDs.

dependencies.name: py-shtab
dependencies.description: Automatically generate shell tab completion scripts for python CLI apps.

dependencies.name: py-tabulate
dependencies.description: Pretty-print tabular data

dependencies.name: py-toml
dependencies.description:
A Python library for parsing and creating TOML configuration files. For
more information on the TOML standard, see https://github.com/toml-
lang/toml.git

dependencies.name: py-tqdm
dependencies.description: A Fast, Extensible Progress Meter

dependencies.name: py-typing-extensions
dependencies.description:
The typing_extensions module contains both backports of these changes as
well as experimental types that will eventually be added to the typing
module, such as Protocol (see PEP 544 for details about protocols and
static duck typing).

dependencies.name: py-voluptuous
dependencies.description: Voluptous, despite the name, is a Python data validation library.

dependencies.name: py-wheel
dependencies.description: A built-package format for Python.

dependencies.name: py-zc-lockfile
dependencies.description: Basic inter-process locks

dependencies.name: python
dependencies.description: The Python programming language.

dependent_to.name: gmt
dependent_to.description:
GMT (Generic Mapping Tools) is an open source collection of about 80
command-line tools for manipulating geographic and Cartesian data sets
(including filtering, trend fitting, gridding, projecting, etc.) and
producing PostScript illustrations ranging from simple x-y plots via
contour maps to artificially illuminated surfaces and 3D perspective
views.
